text: HRdf4 <7czftu <HT gfaa<ut {HI /Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ier #aa7t 3r <oThrf #ATT4) '4R /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 NT #IY National Highways Authority of India QTMA Extn  2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 01-5 & 6, dqer-10, HOT, 7f forit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn 01/08/2012 POLICY MATTERS Admnistration/ Finance (82/2012) Sub: Delegation of Powvers with respect to OBM works for 4/6 lane stretches maintained by NHAI As per circular no. 8/2007 , the delegation for sanction and approval of estimates, works relating to Operation and Maintenance and other works contracts up to Rs 50 lakh is with Members. It is now decided to delegate powers for O&M of 4/6 lane NHs maintained by NHAI on Short Term Contract basis as follow: 1. O&M estimates within NHAI norms, invitation of RFQ / RFP shall be approved by Member. Engineering improvement works above Rs 5.00 Cr during O&M shall be approved by Chairman. 2 Constitution of Evaluation Committee and approval of technical evaluation based on recommendation of the Evaluation Committee shall be approved by Member; In case there is rejection or disqualification involved on the issues other than the bidder not meeting the technical eligibility criteria or an issue of interpretation, the matter shall be placed before Chairman_ 3_ Member may authorize Regional Officer to invite and accept bids for works of extremely urgent nature subject to adhering to extant norms and procedures 4_ In case amount of Lowest bid is more than estimated cost 15%, for bids invited by Regional Officer , accepting authority shall be Member and for  bids invited at HQ, accepting authority shall be Chairman. Full justification in such cases shall be recorded: 5. Engineer may approve variation in individual BOQ Item up to + / - 5% of agreement quantities within overall contract amount: Regional Officer may approve variation in individual BOQ item up to + / - 15% of agreement quantity and Non BOQ items aggregating to 5% of contract value subject to overall variation in contract amount not exceeding by 5%. Member may approve variation in individual BOQ item up to +/ - 20% of agreement quantity and Non BOQ items aggregating to 10% of contract value. Member may approve EOT (with or without liquidated damages) 6 months EC will have full powers for variations and EOT: 6 This issues with the approval of Chairman.
